title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1230/96 of 28 June 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 1424/95 temporarily adapting the special arrangements for imports of certain products in the beer and veal product group originating in Switzerland and the Republics of Bosnia-Herzegovina, Croatia and Slovenia and the former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia with the view to the implementation of the Agreement on Agriculture concluded during the Uruguay Round of multilateral trade negotiations
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1230/96 of 28 June 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 1424/95 temporarily adapting the special arrangements for imports of certain products in the beer and veal product group originating in Switzerland and the Republics of Bosnia-Herzegovina, Croatia and Slovenia and the former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia with the view to the implementation of the Agreement on Agriculture concluded during the Uruguay Round of multilateral trade negotiations
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 3 of Regulation (EC) No 1424/95, '30 June 1996` is hereby replaced by '30 June 1997`.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 June 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 349, 31. 12. 1994, p. 105.
(2) See page 1 of this Official Journal.
(3) OJ No L 141, 24. 6. 1995, p. 19.
